title: Stockpile of keys with no boxes to unlock...
body:
Stockpile of keys with no boxes to unlock...

Anybody have the same thing?

Should Riot make it so you can turn keys into a box?

It takes 3 fragments to make each key...
I got a bunch of keys!
I get a box like once a year. 

Maybe trade 500 orange essence for a box?

7 keys for a box?

replies.body: If you're out of chests, just pick any champ and play them in a different role. Take a mage top, an ADC mid, or a top as Support. I needed a quick box and I literally played Cho'Gath support and went like 3-1-5 and got an S rank.

or how bout $ for chest? cuz you can get them with RP 

also you can only get 52 chest a year/season and thats 1 per week and you can only earn them on champs that you previously didnt earn them on...

say like you got one on fiora and you play her cuz you main her and keep getting S+ but cuz you already got 1 chest on her you cant get any more on her
its really easy to get boxes, jsut get an S on champs you dont already have one on. most people got ll the boxes they could (4/month), adn are low on keys
